title: Food for thought
creator_credit: R. Ronald Brown, Christopher Tate, Gerald Wilson, Michel Laloride and Century II Motion Pictures
brief_description: Television personality Blake Emmons presents the safe handling of food in the home, based on two principles - the time and temperature rule and the cross contamination rule.
